amendment.description: An amendment to increase the funding for the Public and Indian Housing Programs Tenant-Based Rental Assistance by $512,000,000.

action.text: Mr. Diaz-Balart raised a point of order against the Norton amendment (A030). Mr. Diaz-Balart stated that the amendment seeks to cause a net increase in budget authority in violation of the provisions of H. Res. 5. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A030) offered by Ms. Norton.
